rComments: This education class was the first class I took in the education department, and it made me want to minor in Education. I became aware of the different types of inequalities present in our education system, besides race and class. No bad they changed the education series. Nygreen lectures are a boring at times but the reading material is great!

This professor is better suited for elementary school and not serious academia, especially at a UC. Class did not promote critical thought and only served as a 10 week ideology seminar. This class is the reason I will not study education further.
